msContents.summary: The document seems to be a tax receipt. The word ἀπόδειξιϲ (“receipt”) is repeated several times.

msItemStruct.note: Written transversa charta. Three or four different hands can be discerned. The main hand is a slanting capital with some cursive forms. The orthography wavers especially in vowel lengths and diphthongs. The second hand is an accustomed cursive, while the third is a rather unaccustomed upright capital. In the Hθ-fragments, there may be a fourth hand with more rounded capital letters.
